Text:
Great torrent bro, but I followed your instructions to the word and the game seems to start (screen goes black) but then a critical error comes up saying 
"General protection fault"
plz help me man :(
and its all in a foreign language :o
Mount image... What Fucking Image?!?!?!?! there aint any image file... -.-'

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Download Daemon Tools Lite to mount the .mdx image of the game (free download from Daemon Tools website).
2. Launch the Installer (the "autorun" should prompt you; if not just open "My Computer" and the Installer will show up in your cd/dvd drive).
3. Install game. (Just click the "next>" buttons when prompted even though it is in another langauge.)
4. Copy the "src" folder located in the torrent's crack folder to the game's directory. Mine was - C:\Program Files (x86)\Ubisoft\Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Conviction. Overwrite the existing files when prompted to do so.
4. Change the language from Russian to English by:
a) google "Patch102 [Trad - Rus to Eng]" and download
b) extract and then copy the contents of the patch folder to the game directory (exactly the same as above)
c) overwite files when prompted

NOTE: Some Anitvirus software will detect viruses. Ignore these detections.
Enjoy
